name: Cube Horror at Mansion
description:
Welcome to Cube Horror Mansion

Press R for restart to back at Room 0 (if you want)

Movement:

Arrow for move

Hold space for sprint

v1.0 : 100 rooms in totals

v1.1 : 260 rooms in totals

v1.2 : 350 rooms in totals

v1.2.1 : 350 rooms in totals + 2 new jumpscares and door sound

v1.2.2 : 350 rooms in totals + Bug Fix

4 jumpscares in Game

6 Monsters in game !

Enjoy

By NathMaker76
